page.title: 08RIVER AVON
page.content: THE RIVER AVON FLOWS THROUGH CHRISTIAN MALFORD AND OUR CLASS TRIED TO FLOAT A BIG RAFT DOWN IT.WE MADE IT OUT OF PLASTIC BECAUSE WE THOUGHT IT WOULD FLOAT WELL.WE MADE A GUY FAWKES TO SIT ON THE RAFT.IT FLOATED BUT THEN IT KEPT GETTING STUCK IN THE WEEDS AND WHEN WE TRIED TO PULL IT OUT IT BROKE TO BITS.LAST YEAR WE LOOKED AT THE LITTLE STREAM AND WE FOUND LOTS OF DIFFERENT WATER INSECTS_SHRIMPS,WATER LOUSE,MAYFLY LARVAE,CADDISFLY LARVAE,POND SKATERS,LEECHES,DAPHNIA,STONEFLY,SNAIL S.THIS YEAR WE HAVE GROWN LOTS OF TADPOLES AND SET THEM FREE IN PONDS .SOME WENT TO MRS.TILSON,KATIE POTTER,STEVEN HARRIS,KERRY BRUCE,SARAH POWELL,ANDREW BURROWS
